snippet: Shares rose after investors saw comments from Ben S. Bernanke, chairman of the Federal Reserve, as indicating fresh action from the central bank was likely.
abstract: Stock indexes finish higher, with sufficient gains to put the market in positive territory for August; gains follow a positive statement from Federal Reserve Chairman Ben S Bernanke.
lead_paragraph: Shares rose after investors saw comments from Ben S. Bernanke, chairman of the Federal Reserve, as indicating fresh action from the central bank was likely.

headline.main: Shares Rise After Fed Chairman’s Speech and End Month Higher
headline.print_headline: Shares Rise After Fed Chairman’s Speech and End Month Higher
